poemsDataJson.list_full: 由良(ゆら)のとを 渡(わた)る舟人(ふなびと) かぢを絶(た)え 行方(ゆくへ)も知(し)らぬ 恋(こひ)の道(みち)かな
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Like a mariner//Sailing over Yura's strait//With his rudder gone://Where, over the deep of love,//The end lies, I do not know.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Yura no to o|Wataru funa-bito|Kaji o tae|Yukue mo shiranu|Koi no michi kana
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ゆくへもしらぬ こひのみちかな
poemsDataJson.author: 曾禰好忠(そねのよしただ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 将来の予測のつかない恋の行く末の不安
